You signed a Pact with the Zone. You are being rewarded with amazing abilities in exchange for your life force. To prevent your demise and to prolong your existence, you are given a chance to sacrifice other riches of the Zone. The quality of the offering determines how well you will be compensated. Lucifer grants immense strength and abilities, making its wearer something of a demigod but remember... the clock is ticking.
